TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Tongan, title = Tongan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tongan} }

S.FORM: tongan Itiniay i Ren'ai Cen no Nantou ko tongan a niyaro', 278 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 952 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 88% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 841 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 12% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 111 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Seediq71%, Tayal9%, Amis2%, Bunun3%, Paiwan1%, Truku1%, roma1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko paisingan i niyaro'.

tongan Itiniay i Ren'ai Cen no Nantoo ko tongan a niyaro', 278 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 952 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 88% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 841 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 12% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 111 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Seediq71%, Tayal9%, Amis2%, Bonon3%, Paiwan1%, Troko1%, roma1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko paisingan i niyaro'.
